explanations.Large Language Model: The paper evaluates the responses of ChatGPT-3.5, which is a large language model, in answering patient-centered frequently asked questions related to glaucoma.
explanations.LLM: ChatGPT-3.5 is a type of large language model (LLM), and the study focuses on its application in clinical practice.
explanations.ChatGPT: The paper specifically examines the performance of ChatGPT-3.5 in providing responses to glaucoma-related FAQs, making this keyword directly relevant.
